column4: hello boys and girls, does anyone know how to fix an xorg.conf file so my ati radeon x1400 video driver will work and i can boot into feisty...i do have the livecd, but didnt use it to intall feisty.. i used the update manager and upgraded instread
Did you just have these problems with the new update today?
sorry, I've stayed away from ATI cards.
I guess you could find someone with the same card and copy the data into your xorg.conf
